overview:
Commonfig harnesses the commerce-building possibilities of the web like no other in its pursuit to become worldâ€™s largest services marketplace.

Professionals are able to promote, dialogue and build relationships with those who use them. People needing specific services can compare, shop, schedule instantly and refer their favorite professionals. Itâ€™s simple. Itâ€™s symbiotic. And itâ€™s a living, growing community that becomes infinitely more powerful as you use it.

The inspiration comes from the African fig tree, one of the oldest examples of mutualism in nature, where one living thing cannot propagate without the other. The fig tree would perish without the tiny wasp to spread its seed. The wasp relies on the fruit of the tree for nourishment and the shelter. Apart, they wouldnâ€™t survive. But together, they grow, and thrive, and multiply.

Welcome to the commonfig philosophy. Like the tree and wasp, unite and prosper.
